game.name: Dunjinn
game.shortDescription: Turn-based dungeon crawl, every step advances foes; stealth, noise, and light matter. Procedural rooms mix traps, mimics, locks, loot; combat is gear-driven with augments, consumables, and breakable durability. Between runs use town to shop, craft/repair, vault gear; death drops your pack.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Turn-based dungeon crawl, every step advances foes; stealth, noise, and light matter. Procedural rooms mix traps, mimics, locks, loot; combat is gear-driven with augments, consumables, and breakable durability. Between runs use town to shop, craft/repair, vault gear; death drops your pack.
